items.value: Click two rooms of the same kind to merge them together and remove the walls between them.
Click anything, anything at all to delete it!
The building block of any level! There can only be one room of this type in a level!
The intended location to place notebooks.
The Principal will teleport you to one of these if you get sent to detention.
No special properties. Gotta Sweep goes to his spawn point, not one of these rooms.
No special properties. Dr Reflex's hammer is at his spawn point.
No sound will play in this room, and if a player is in it their game is muted.
The player can run infinitely in this room, and all rule violations will be forgotten!
Bananas are literred across the floor in this room.
